rows.name: text
rows.value: @global.app_name is brought to you by the collaboration of partners including INNODEMS, IDEMS International, University of Oxford, University of Cape Town, National Institute for Medical Research (NIMR) - Mwanza Centre Tanzania, and Clowns Without Borders South Africa (‘the @global.app_name team’).
